org.jgentleframework.core.reflection.metadata
Class MetadataImpl

java.lang.Object
  org.jgentleframework.core.reflection.metadata.MetadataImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
Metadata
Direct Known Subclasses:
MetadataController
public class MetadataImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements Metadata

This class represents a Metadata information that can be used for basic configuration information designation.

Note: As concerns using Metadata in order to represent attribute information of one annotation, key of Metadata is name of attribute, and value (data) is returned data of corresponding attribute.

Author:
LE QUOC CHUNG - mailto: skydunkpro@yahoo.com
